mapper.insert: insert into salesub (saleid, goodid, price, goodqty, opertime, verification) values (#{saleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodqty,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update salesub set goodid = #{goodid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goodqty = #{goodqty,jdbcType=BIGINT}, opertime = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, verification = #{verification,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND saleid = #{saleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, saleid, goodid, price, goodqty, opertime, verification from salesub
